name: Jamble
headline: Fashion resale marketplace powered by live streaming and video
description: Jamble is the new place to buy & sell secondhand fashion. We empower resellers with video & Live streaming tools to sell more effectively; and buyers with a unique compelling experience. Jamble is designed for the sustainable fashion community to engage, connect and inspire. We’re a mobile-first platform and launched on iOS! 👉 Check us out: https://apple.co/3Pfwran
tags: industry:marketplace; industry:sustainable-fashion; industry:consumer; industry:social; industry:creator-economy; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Aymar Dumoulin, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder of Jamble, working on the product. Previous experiences in the consumer space, as a VC analyst at Convivialité Ventures in SF and Private Equity at L Catterton (Paris). Alum of Essec Business School and University Paris-Dauphine.

founders.name: Jeremy Gozlan, Founder
founders.description:
Hey! I am Jeremy, a tech guy from Paris, France. While originally specialised in AI (computer vision), I always loved developing iOS mobile apps. Sneakerhead for more than 15 years, becoming Jamble CTO was nothing else than my destiny.
Regarding my studies,
I recently graduated from Ecole Polytechnique, France most prestigious Engineering School and previously graduated from the University of Bath as a Computer System Engineer.

The Bidding Experience
## Buy & Sell like never before
Step into Jamble's unique fashion landscape: from exploring livestreams to placing winning bids, experience an effortless and exhilarating shopping journey.
Live Now
### Discover Live Shows you like.
Browse through an array of livestreams to find your style, from vintage to modern streetwear.
Start at $1
### Spot Gems you love.
Dive into live fashion showcases and interact as sellers unveil exclusive items.
Win the auction
### Be the top bidder!
Claim your finds by mastering the art of bidding – become the top bidder and own the style you love!
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656702df41c68a41e8fc19e6/656f3d8a6e8530d2434dc20e_icon-shop.svg)
The Hottest Marketplace

Style into Action
## Got a closet full of gems? Start selling on Jamble!
Step into the spotlight as a Jamble seller. Showcase your unique fashion finds and connect with a engaging community that loves your dynamic style. It's your stage to shine and succeed in the world of fashion.
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656702df41c68a41e8fc19e6/656d81f537eaca3843395a84_apple-logo-black.png)Download App](https://www.jambleapp.com/<https:/apps.apple.com/us/app/jamble-live-fashion-shopping/id1599696300?uo=4>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656702df41c68a41e8fc19e6/656f3b1d6eb7d0cc609ac2db_sell-1-min.png)
Unleash Your Entrepreneurial Spirit
##### Create Your Live Selling Journey
Elevate your resale journey with Jamble. Turn passion into profit, engage a vibrant community, and build your thriving business empire.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656702df41c68a41e8fc19e6/656f3b1c91c0655521b53ece_sell-2-min.png)
Make Friends, Have Fun
##### Join the fastest growing Fashion community.
Be part of a community that values individuality, exclusive trends, quality finds, and the joy of discovering your next favorite piece.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656702df41c68a41e8fc19e6/656f3b1c45e25b343b464057_sell-3-min.png)
Go Live, or Sell on the Marketplace
##### Optimize every sale with the new features.
Live auctions redefined. Elevate your earnings with Jamble's innovative features.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624380709031623bfe4aee60/624380709031626fc14aee84_icon.svg)

Ready to Jamble?
## Ready to Start? Join the fastest growing community.
Embark on a fashion journey with Jamble. Whether you’re here to discover unique finds, place winning bids, or showcase your style as a seller, the adventure begins now. Tap into a world where fashion, fun, and community intersect.

## FAQs
If you have further questions or need assistance, please feel free to reach out to us at support@jambleapp.com.
What is Jamble ?
Jamble is a secondhand fashion marketplace powered by live videos. Designed for the reseller community, it offers an innovative and interactive way to shop.
Is it hard to start selling on Jamble?
The process is straightforward and can be done through the Jamble app. Once you have created an account, you will need to link a bank account and provide some basic information about your business. Once your account is set up, you can start listing items for sale.
How long does it take to be approved to be a live seller?
We review each application individually, so it may take a bit of time. We will try to get back to you with an answer in the two weeks following your application. 
Can you make a living on Jamble?
Jamble is a legitimate selling platform that many resellers use to make their full-time or part-time income.
Is it safe to buy on Jamble?
Jamble takes product authenticity seriously and has a number of measures in place to protect buyers from counterfeits and inauthentic sellers.

## FAQs
If you have further questions or need assistance, please feel free to reach out to us at support@jambleapp.com.
What is Jamble ?
Jamble is a secondhand fashion marketplace powered by live videos. Designed for the reseller community, it offers an innovative and interactive way to shop.
Is it hard to start selling on Jamble?
The process is straightforward and can be done through the Jamble app. Once you have created an account, you will need to link a bank account and provide some basic information about your business. Once your account is set up, you can start listing items for sale.
How long does it take to be approved to be a live seller?
We review each application individually, so it may take a bit of time. We will try to get back to you with an answer in the two weeks following your application. 
Can you make a living on Jamble?
Jamble is a legitimate selling platform that many resellers use to make their full-time or part-time income.
Is it safe to buy on Jamble?
Jamble takes product authenticity seriously and has a number of measures in place to protect buyers from counterfeits and inauthentic sellers.

generated_description:
### Jamble: The Live Fashion Resale Marketplace

**Overview**
Founded in 2021 and based in San Francisco, Jamble is a dynamic online marketplace specifically tailored for secondhand fashion enthusiasts. It blends sustainability with innovation by utilizing live streaming and video tools to create an engaging buying and selling experience. With a small but dedicated team of three and support from Y Combinator's Batch S22, Jamble is pushing the boundaries of how fashion resale works.

**Mission**
Jamble's mission is clear: to empower both resellers and buyers within the sustainable fashion community. By providing robust video and live streaming capabilities, they create a platform where sellers can showcase their items compellingly while buyers receive a unique shopping experience.

**What They Offer**
- **Live Shopping Experience:** Jamble transforms traditional online shopping into a live event where sellers auction items in real-time, creating a social atmosphere. Buyers can engage, bid, and interact, making the process feel more like a community event than mere commerce.
  
- **Vast Product Selection:** With over 700,000 items available from more than 4,000 sellers, shoppers can dive into a treasure trove of fashion gems, from vintage pieces to contemporary styles. 

- **Mobile-First Approach:** Designed for on-the-go users, Jamble launched exclusively on iOS, allowing seamless access to the platform via smartphones.

**Community Engagement**
Jamble isn't just about transactions; it's about building a vibrant community. Users often describe it as "social media for thrifting," where creativity thrives and relationships develop. Sellers report enjoying the interactions and friendships they forge while selling, proving that fashion can unite people.

**Getting Started**
For those interested in selling, becoming a live seller on Jamble is straightforward. After setting up an account and linking a bank account, users can begin listing their items for sale. Plus, the platform has safeguards in place to ensure product authenticity, giving buyers peace of mind.

**Key Tags**
Jamble is categorized under various hashtags that highlight its core focus areas:   
- #Marketplace  
- #SustainableFashion  
- #Consumer  
- #Social  
- #CreatorEconomy  
- #SanFranciscoBayArea  

**Future Aspirations**
Jamble aims to redefine how people think about fashion consumption. By emphasizing resale, they align with eco-friendly practices that resonate with today's conscious consumers. They believe that fashion should be fun, accessible, and, above all, sustainable.

**Join the Movement**
Whether you're a passionate reseller eager to share your unique finds or a fashion-conscious buyer looking for that perfect piece at a great price, Jamble invites you to join this growing community. Dive into the future of fashion resale today by exploring their app or their website.

**Check it Out:**  
- [Download the Jamble App on iOS](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/jamble-live-fashion-shopping/id1599696300?uo=4)  
- [Visit the Website](https://www.jambleapp.com)  

Jamble isn't just a platform; it's a fashion revolution waiting for you to be a part of it.
